```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidyr)

strawberry <- read.csv("strawberry_oct4.csv", header = T)

strwb_census <- strawberry %>% filter(Program=="CENSUS")
strwb_survey <- strawberry %>% filter(Program=="SURVEY")

#cleaning Value column
vals <- strwb_census$Value
vals <- gsub(",", "", vals)
vals <- as.numeric(vals)

strwb_census$Value <- vals

#function
clean_values <- function(x){
  x <- gsub(",", "", x)
  footnotes <- str_detect(x, "^\\([:upper:]\\)$")
  return(unique(x[which(footnotes)]))
}
```
